| Learn about City Council members and meetings and access agendas and minutes. |  | View the city charter and code of ordinances for the City of Lakeway. |
| [City Boards & Commissions](https://www.lakeway-tx.gov/27/index.aspx?NID=178) |  | [Election Information](https://www.lakeway-tx.gov/427/Election-Information) |
| View information about Lakeway boards and commissions including meeting times and members. |  | Review current election information, including key dates and links to Travis County and Texas Secretary of State Election Divisions websites. |
| [City Manager's Office](https://www.lakeway-tx.gov/664/City-Managers-Office) |  | [History of City Government](https://www.lakeway-tx.gov/571/History-of-City-Government) |
| Browse information about the administrative heads of the City of Lakeway, the city manager and deputy city manager. |  | Read about the establishment and growth of the City, and browse through listings of past government officials of the City of Lakeway. |
| [City Hall](https://www.lakeway-tx.gov/861/City-Hall) |  | [Open Government / Transparency](https://www.lakeway-tx.gov/661/Open-Government-Transparency) |
| Read information about City Hall, location, and how to contact. |  | Learn about the City of Lakeway's commitment to providing open, transparent, and accountable government. |
| [City Secretary's Office](https://www.lakeway-tx.gov/566/City-Secretarys-Office) |  | [Public Information / Open Records Request](https://www.lakeway-tx.gov/495/Public-Information-Act-Request) |
| View functions, responsibilities, and duties of the city secretary, with information on elections and records management. |  | Read how to request public information and what to expect after a open records request is made. |
| [City Staff Directory](https://www.lakeway-tx.gov/directory.aspx) |  | [Public Notices](https://www.lakeway-tx.gov/1110) |
| Browse the City of Lakeway staff directory. |  | View public notices for variances, special permits, subdivisions, annexations, zoning, and ordinance amendments. |
| [City's Comprehensive Plan](https://www.lakeway-tx.gov/documentcenter/view/17431) |  | [Videos - City Council, ZAPCO & More](https://www.lakeway-tx.gov/1062/Meeting-Videos---Council-ZAPCO) |
| View the City of Lakeway Comprehensive Plan. |  |
